sns.set_style('darkgrid')
fig, ax = plt.subplots(6, 1, figsize=(5, 20))

for i, col in enumerate(list(df.columns.values)):

 if i >= len(ax):
 break

 axes_box = ax[i]
 sns.boxplot(data=df, x=col, ax=axes_box,color='#a5c687')
 ax[i].set_title(col,fontsize=15,color='magenta')
